SELECT b.id AS id, b.name AS name, b.created_time AS createdTime, b.abstracts AS abstracts, COALESCE( img.image_url, REGEXP_SUBSTR( b.content, 'https://[^[:space:]"''<>()]+[.](png|jpg)', 1, 1, 'i' ) ) AS imageUrl, c.name AS category, l.name AS label FROM blogs b LEFT JOIN main_image AS img ON b.id = img.blog_id LEFT JOIN category_blogs AS cb ON b.id = cb.blog_id LEFT JOIN category AS c ON cb.category_id = c.id LEFT JOIN label_blogs AS lb ON b.id = lb.blog_id LEFT JOIN label AS l ON lb.label_id = l.id
AND (b.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR b.abstracts LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR b.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM category_blogs cb2 WHERE cb2.blog_id = b.id AND cb2.category_id = #{categoryId} )
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM label_blogs lb2 WHERE lb2.blog_id = b.id AND lb2.label_id = #{labelId} )
ORDER BY b.created_time DESC
